sourcesContent:
import React, {useContext} from 'react' import {SampleData} from './SampleData' import {Link, Switch, Route} from 'react-router-dom' import {Context} from './Context' const SearchResult = (item) => { const {itemFetch} = useContext(Context) let endTime = item.endtime let timeleft = endTime.toString().substring(endTime.lastIndexOf("P") + 1, endTime.lastIndexOf("D")) console.log(timeleft+"ayyyyy") return (

itemFetch(item.itemId)} style={{marginTop:'.8rem', marginBottom:'0rem', textAlign:'left', fontSize:'.9rem'}}>{item.title}

{item.subtitle}New

{/*

Item Price:

*/}

${(item.price).split(".")[1].length < 2 ? (item.price.concat("0")) : item.price }

+ {(item.shipping == "Free" )? "Free" : item.shippingcost} Shipping

{item.buyitnow == "true" ? "Buy It Now" : "Auction"}{item.listingtype == "AuctionWithBIN" ? " + Auction" : null}

{/*

Quantity:

3

Ends Tuesday

Seller:

Destroyer

100% positive Feedback

*/}

{timeleft} 2d 8h left (Mon, 05:13 PM)

{/* */}
) } const ImageContainer = { backgroundColor:'white', display: 'block', width:'13rem', height:'5%', marginLeft:'3%', // borderWidth:'thin', // borderColor:'black', // borderStyle:'solid', height:'5%', boxShadow: '0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 6px 20px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.19)' } const ImageStyle = { display: 'flex', resizeMode: 'contain', resizeImage: 'contain', marginRight: 'auto', marginLeft:'auto', maxWidth: '100%', // width:'auto', maxHeight: '100%', backgroundColor:'white' } export default SearchResult
